participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, with a passion for music and literature. Enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: I now spend more time listening to rap music and working on my Ford truck. I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time. I am not sure of my ethnic background, but I love pepperoni pizza! I work at a restaurant as a waiter. I’ve been married for five years.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a love for storytelling. Enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: I live in a small town in the Midwest, USA. I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in. I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet. My dad was a cop until he was killed. My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Not too bad! Just working on some writing. How about you?
Pretty good! I'm just hanging out, listening to music.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds, but I'm really into rap and hip hop right now.
Oh nice! I like rap too. What are some of your favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
Those are all great artists! I like them too.
What are some of your favorite things to do in your free time?
I like to read, write, and go for walks.
Oh cool! I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different types of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
Oh nice! I like that too. I've been reading a lot of historical fiction lately too.
Awesome! What are some of the books you've been reading?
I've been reading "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah and "The Book Thief" by Markus Zusak.
Oh I've read both of those! They were both great books.
I know right! I really enjoyed them both.
